title: Subpart 28-2 - Absence with Pay for Illness/Disability for Certain Managerial/Confidential Employees
content:
Subpart 28-2 - Absence with Pay for Illness/Disability for Certain Managerial/Confidential Employees

State Regulations
§ 28-2.1 - Sick leave
§ 28-2.2 - Extended sick leave

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
